Key Match Events: Freddie Freeman homered in the first four games
Gavin Lux and Mookie Betts hit sacrifice flies in the eighth inning to put the Dodgers in front
Walker Buehler closed out the World Series and shut the door on the New York Yankees
The Dodgers erased a five-run deficit in the fifth inning with a series of Yankees miscues
Blake Treinen recorded seven outs in relief, including a crucial strikeout of Anthony Rizzo to strand the runners
Pre-Game Insights: The Dodgers were predicted to win 120 games this year
The team received a scare when clubhouse leader Justin Turner tested positive for COVID-19 in the 2020 World Series
The Dodgers had a tumultuous season with a rash of pitching ailments and injuries to key players
Manager David Roberts reminded his team that they still had Hall of Famers and All-Stars on the roster
Post-Match Reflections: The Dodgers' title is their second in the franchise's new 'golden era'
Manager David Roberts said there's no asterisk on this title
The team's president of baseball operations, Andrew Friedman, said his ultimate goal is to say that this was the golden era of Dodger baseball
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Dodgers' championship validates a $1.4 billion offseason splurge
The team's World Series win was a six-game demolition of the Yankees
The Dodgers will get their title without an asterisk and the people of Los Angeles will get their parade
